summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2015 KIA SOUL. THE CONTACT STATED THE PASSENGER SIDE SEAT BELT FAILED TO OPERATE AS DESIGNED. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO REGAL KIA (1025 BARTOW RD, LAKELAND, FL 33801) TO BE DIAGNOSED. THE CONTACT WAS INFORMED THAT SEAT BELT ASSEMBLY NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 77,655.
